objects.specification: A flat floor plane finished in a smooth, neutral-tone material with a subtle matte texture, designed to provide a stable base for all booth elements and comfortable walking surface for visitors.
A tall rectangular wall panel in a neutral gray tone with a smooth matte finish, serving as the back boundary of the booth and providing a backdrop for branding and display elements.
A side wall in neutral gray with a fine matte texture, creating an enclosed feel while supporting hanging graphics and acoustic damping.
A side wall in neutral gray with a fine matte texture, balancing the booth enclosure and supporting graphic mounts.
A front wall segment in a neutral matte finish, sized to frame the entrance opening and maintain visual consistency with the other booth walls.
A mirrored front segment matching the opposite side, providing symmetry around the central entrance and finished in a neutral tone.
A modern demonstration car with sleek aerodynamic lines, painted in a vibrant glossy red finish, featuring detailed wheels and realistic proportions to attract visitor attention.
A sleek rectangular registration counter with a complementary cool blue finish, featuring a smooth countertop for visitor check-in and integrated cable management.
A tall slender stand in a warm orange accent color, with a flat top surface for holding promotional materials or digital screens, and a stable square base.
A tall slender stand in a warm orange accent color, with a flat top surface for holding promotional materials or digital screens, and a stable square base.

A round tabletop in a soft complementary blue tone with a slender central support, providing a casual seating area for small groups.
A modern armless chair with a gently contoured seat and backrest in a complementary blue fabric finish, designed for visitor comfort.
A modern armless chair with a gently contoured seat and backrest in a complementary blue fabric finish, designed for visitor comfort.

A compact stack of three scaled-down car tires in matte black rubber texture, creating a themed decorative element in the booth corner.

A small decorative potted plant with lush green foliage and a simple ceramic pot, adding a natural accent to the booth interior.

A hanging wall banner featuring high-resolution car graphics and bold logo branding, printed on durable fabric with a matte finish.
A hanging side-wall banner with vibrant car imagery and logo elements, printed on high-quality matte fabric to reduce glare.

A front entrance banner segment featuring promotional text and brand logo in complementary colors, printed on robust fabric with a matte finish.
